menuList.title: Greek Salad
menuList.highlight: Our delicious salad is served with Feta cheese and peeled cucumber. Includes tomatoes, onions, olives, salt and oregano in the ingredients.

menuList.title: Bruschetta
menuList.highlight: Delicious grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and salt. Our Bruschetta includes tomato and cheese.

menuList.title: Grilled Fish
menuList.highlight: Fantastic grilled fish seasoned with salt.
